articles.description: Illinois health officials reported 2,838 new COVID-19 cases and 102 deaths Thursday. Walgreens will begin vaccinating those eligible against the disease Friday.
articles.content: CHICAGO (WLS) -- Select Walgreens across the state will begin vaccinating those eligible against COVID-19 Friday.They are prioritizing healthcare works, those over 65 and those with preexisting condi… [+6541 chars]

articles.title: Hours extended at Johnston County drive-thru COVID-19 vaccine clinic - WRAL.com
articles.description: A drive-thru vaccine clinic at North Johnston High School reported short wait times and plenty of COVID-19 vaccines on Wednesday.
articles.content:
By Aaron Thomas, WRAL reporter
Selma, N.C. — Despite short wait, extended hours, organizers struggle to deplete COVID-19 vaccine supply at Johnston County drive-thru clinic
